      • determineCurrentPosition

        public void determineCurrentPosition​(GeolocationOptions options)
        Description copied from interface: Geolocation

        Determines the client's location once. The callback will be called when the server recieves an answer from the mobile device. Determining locations is coupled with a configuration passed in as GeolocationOptions.

        Specified by:
        determineCurrentPosition in interface Geolocation
        Parameters:
        options - The configuration for determining the location. Must not be null.

      • watchPosition

        public void watchPosition​(GeolocationOptions options)
        Description copied from interface: Geolocation

        Instructs the client to determine and send the location periodically. The update interval needs to be configured in the GeolocationOptions parameter.

        Specified by:
        watchPosition in interface Geolocation
        Parameters:
        options - The configuration for determining the location. Must not be null.

      • clearWatch

        public void clearWatch()
        Description copied from interface: Geolocation

        Instructs the mobile device to stop sending location updates periodically.

        Specified by:
        clearWatch in interface Geolocation
